|brand = Lite-On |model = WCBN806 |submodelappend = <!-- yes for space --> |submodel = A |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 05/10/2017 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Lite-On_WCBN806A |sernum = <!-- Serial number prefix --> |wlclass = AC600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |if = M.2 |if_bus_version = <!-- ie. 1.0, 1.1, 2.0, 2.2 --> |ifconnector = <!-- Interface Connector Type, Leave blank for none --> |formfactor = 1630
|vendor_id = 168c |device_id = 0042 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = PPD-QCNFA435,RYK-WNFQ158ACNBT |icid = <!-- Industry Canada ID, Leave blank for none --> |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 00:0E:8E
|chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9377; |chip2 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip3 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |chip4 = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; -->
|antconn = MHF4 |antenna = <!-- Antenna type --> |txchains = 1 |rxchains = 1 |sstreams = 1 |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |802.11ac = 433 |802.11n = 150/150 |802.11g = 54 |802.11b = 11 |802.11a = 54 |wififreq = 2.4 or 5 |receive_sens = <!-- Receive sensitivity --> |transmit_power = <!-- Transmit power -->
|linuxdriv = |windriv =

|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 04/27/2016 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== [[QCA]] Model: [[Qualcomm Atheros QCNFA435|QCNFA435]] (NGFF M.2 1630 Key A/E) *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/PPD-QCNFA435 PPD-QCNFA435] (12/26/2014) *FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/RYK-WNFQ158ACNBT RYK-WNFQ158ACNBT] (04/27/2016) :OEM: [[Lite-On]] WCBN806A-S6 ([https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2973099 Label Sample])
===Specifications=== :‧ Chipset: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9377A (MAC/BB/RF) :‧ Standard: 802.11abgn/ac 1T1R (433Mbps) MU-MIMO :‧ Interface: M.2 Card (PCIe: WLAN; USB 2.0: Bluetooth) :‧ Bluetooth: V 4.1, V 4.0 LE, V 3.0 + HS, V 2.1 + EDR :‧ Antenna: 2x IPEX MHF4 connector, 1T1R with RX diversity :‧ Enhanced wireless security: WEP, WPA, WPA2, WPS, 802.1x :‧ Concurrent Wi-Fi and BT co-existence, support Windows
==See also== * [[SparkLAN WNFQ-158ACN(BT)]] - 802.11ac WiFi + BT M.2 Module :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9377, 1T1R; OEM: [[Lite-On WCBN806A]] :[[Lite-On]] WCBN604BH-L6, WCBN806A-S6 ([https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2973099 FCC Label Sample]) * [[SparkLAN WNFQ-255ACN(BT)]] - 802.11ac WiFi + BT M.2 Module :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6174, 2T2R; OEM: [[Lite-On WCBN804A]] * [[SparkLAN WNFQ-258ACN(BT)]] - 802.11ac WiFi + BT M.2 Module :[[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA6174A-5, 2T2R; OEM: [[Lite-On WCBN807A]]
[[Category:English Documentation]]
